effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
